description:
Manual games allow you to set custom check locations and custom item names that will be rolled into a multiworld.
This allows any variety of game -- PC, console, board games, Microsoft Word memes... really anything -- to be part of a multiworld randomizer.
The key component to including these games is some level of manual restriction. Since the items are not actually withheld from the player,
the player must manually refrain from using these gathered items until the tracker shows that they have been acquired or sent.

1.0.0.description:
## Notes
- I'm aware that there are not enough Checks to fit all of the extra Characters. I plan to add settings in the future for this. For ideas on what I plan to add specifically, please feel free to refer to #1 and #2.

Let me know if you find any bugs or have any suggestions!
1.0.0.title: Version 1.0.0

1.1.0.description:
# Changelog
- **The Manual is now compatible with 0.6.2+ of Archipelago.**
- **Added Levelsanity.**
  - For now, it's NOT an Option because...
  - This now allows the game to fit all of its Items, including the non-Progression ones.
1.1.0.title: Version 1.1.0

1.1.1.description:
# Changelog
- This Manual is now compatible with 0.6.3+ of Archipelago.
- Added more Characters, up to v2.142.1 of Sonic Speed Simulator (aka the September 10th, 2025 Update).
  - Feel free to let me know if any Characters are missing!
  - Update: Added the Manual's files to GitHub for anyone who wishes to make PR's (Pull Requests) or overall assist with the Manual's development.
1.1.1.title: Version 1.1.1
